Data: McKay to Cook, no run full delivery, swing in a little and takes the front pad around the knee roll, immediate cry for lbw but probably too high
McKay to Cook, FOUR runs slides this wide of off stump and Cook leans back and cracks it for four through cover point, nice timing
McKay to Cook, no run tighter line but still wide enough to allow Cook to leave

McKay to Cook, OUT full length, Cook feels for it just outside off and nicks it low to Haddin and once again Alistair Cook has fallen early in the piece. It's a decent delivery, tighter line again from the previous delivery which was left, forcing Cook t
McKay to Root, no run wide enough to allow Root to shoulder arms outside off
McKay to Root, no run length delivery on the stumps, Root in the crease pushes to midwicket
Coulter-Nile to Bell, 1 wide much too wide outside off and ignored
Coulter-Nile to Bell, no run full length towards off stump, Bell forward and dabbing towards point
Coulter-Nile to Bell, no run touch wider line on a touch shorter length, left alone
Coulter-Nile to Bell, no run fuller and draws Bell into a cover drive, bit of away swing beats him
Coulter-Nile to Bell, 3 runs this time Bell gets the drive away, typically pleasant stroke, timed reasonably and gets three and mid-off chases back
Coulter-Nile to Root, no run full delivery angled in and Root is caught on the crease, pokes at it and gets a thick outside edge on the bounce to second slip
Coulter-Nile to Root, no run better footwork, forward to this and pushing firmly to mid-off
McKay to Bell, no run full length wide enough to allow Bell to leave
McKay to Bell, 1 run too straight and clipped down to long leg
McKay to Root, no run full at the stumps and Root tries to play to leg from the crease, can only find the bowler
McKay to Root, no run short and wide but Root mistimes the cut to point, missed out
McKay to Root, no run good length and it shapes back in to take the thigh pad
McKay to Root, no run full and well wide of off stump, Root chases it and misses with a drive
Coulter-Nile to Bell, 2 runs full at the stumps, Bell works it wide of mid-on
Coulter-Nile to Bell, no run straighter off stump line, Bell plays a firm drive to extra cover
Coulter-Nile to Bell, 1 run very full at the stumps, Bell jams the bat down onto it and gets a single wide of mid-on
Coulter-Nile to Root, no run Root slow to come forward just outside off, dropping this into the gully
Coulter-Nile to Root, 1 run straighter line and Root gets a thick inside edge backward of square
Coulter-Nile to Bell, FOUR runs full and straight and Bell plays a delightful straight drive, timed very well indeed, a nice sight straight up back past the bowler
McKay to Root, no run good length on off stump, Root had taken a step out of his ground but just blocked
McKay to Root, 2 runs straighter and Root playing from the crease angles one backward of square, it rolls slowly towards long leg and they get two
McKay to Root, no run middle and off line, Root is back and clipping to midwicket
McKay to Root, no run some width outside off and Root cuts but only off a bottom edge and it runs to second slip
McKay to Root, no run fuller on the stumps, Root tucks to midwicket
McKay to Root, no run fuller just outside off, Root times this drive nicely but point goes quickly to his right and saves well
Coulter-Nile to Bell, no run good length on the stumps, Bell plays with the angle to midwicket
Coulter-Nile to Bell, no run fuller and just blocked back to the bowler
Coulter-Nile to Bell, 1 run length delivery a touch wider, allowing Bell to knock it into a gap at cover point for a quick single
Coulter-Nile to Root, no run nicely bowled, this comes back significantly and goes between bat and pad with Root prodding forward on the crease
Coulter-Nile to Root, no run wider line and left alone
Coulter-Nile to Root, no run dabbed from the crease towards point
McKay to Bell, 1 run full on the stumps and tucked wide of mid-on for a quick single
McKay to Root, no run firm drive nicely timed but straight to extra cover
McKay to Root, no run some inswing and it strikes the pad low down but would have been going well down leg
McKay to Root, no run inswinger again, Root a little slow coming out of his ground but does block in front of off stump in the end
McKay to Root, 1 wide wide, too wide, a wide

McKay to Root, OUT full at the pads, Root misses and is struck on the pad, looks pretty straight and given out lbw. We do have reviews available and Root goes upstairs. There were two noises but it doesn't appear as if Root has hit this, nothing on Hot S
McKay to Ballance, no run full just outside off and clipped to point
Coulter-Nile to Bell, no run back of a length on off stump, forced into the covers
Coulter-Nile to Bell, no run full on the off stump, Bell forward pushing into the covers
Coulter-Nile to Bell, no run full at the stumps and Bell was aiming a big stroke leg side and gets a thin edge onto his pad
Coulter-Nile to Bell, 1 run length ball just outside off, dabbed down to third man
Coulter-Nile to Ballance, no run short around leg stump line, ducked under
Coulter-Nile to Ballance, no run better line, sliding across the off stump and Ballance playing forward is beaten
McKay to Bell, no run full at the stumps and nudged back to the bowler
McKay to Bell, no run short of a length on a fourth-stump line, Bell knocks it towards point
McKay to Bell, 1 run some width and Bell guides it down to third man coming half-forward
McKay to Ballance, 1 leg bye back of a length at the pads, it runs off the thigh pad backward of square and Bell calls a sharp leg bye
McKay to Bell, no run full on off stump, Bell graces it to extra cover
McKay to Bell, 1 run not that short but pulled from just outside off, there is a deep point in place and this lands well short of him

Coulter-Nile to Bell, 2 runs very full at the stumps, Bell cracks it down the ground with superb timing, it deflects off the bowler's boot and Bailey at mid-on parries and they get a couple as mid-off cleans up
Coulter-Nile to Bell, no run good length just outside off, Bell stays leg side and tries to swing it down the ground again, mistimes to midwicket
Coulter-Nile to Bell, no run better length and a line tight enough to force Bell to just knock it into the covers
Coulter-Nile to Bell, no run short outside off but just dabbed down to point
Coulter-Nile to Bell, no run finds Clarke at point again with a back-foot forcing stroke
Coulter-Nile to Bell, no run tight off stump line and just blocked
Maxwell to Ballance, 3 runs around the wicket, tossed up outside off, Ballance drives backward of point and deep cover has a long chase
Maxwell to Bell, 1 run stays around the wicket, full length clipped down to long-on
Maxwell to Ballance, no run decent length on off stump pushed to extra cover
Maxwell to Ballance, 1 run straighter line and worked through square leg
Maxwell to Bell, 1 run Bell this time works through square leg, a touch short there Maxwell
Maxwell to Ballance, no run touch short and dabbed to backward point
Doherty to Bell, no run skip down the wicket and rolled back to the bowler
Doherty to Bell, 1 run short and whipped through square leg
Doherty to Ballance, 1 run length ball pushed down to long-on
Doherty to Bell, 1 run just back of a length, pushed out to deep cover
Doherty to Ballance, no run sent across the off stump, Ballance tries to work it to leg but finds the bowler
Doherty to Ballance, no run goes from outside off to leg again but the bowler dives to his left and saves well
Maxwell to Bell, 1 run back foot punch down to long-on, slightly aerially and almost had the bowler interested
Maxwell to Ballance, 1 run full on the stumps, pushed down to long-off
Maxwell to Bell, no run wrong length to cut with Bell hanging back, misses
Maxwell to Bell, no run straighter line and punched into the leg side, Clarke saves at midwicket
Maxwell to Bell, 2 runs slightly short and pulled past midwicket, Warner is in the deep and works well to save four, touch sluggish this outfield
Maxwell to Bell, 1 run well down leg but Bell can only steer it to short long leg
Doherty to Bell, FOUR runs reverse paddle off the stumps and gets it away fine and it runs all the way to fine third man
Doherty to Bell, no run front foot push back to the bowler from off stump
Doherty to Bell, no run blocks a good length up the wicket
Doherty to Bell, no run fuller and pushed off the front foot again, finds the bowler
Doherty to Bell, no run another front foot push, this time finds extra cover
Doherty to Bell, 1 run touch shorter length and this is turned through midwicket
Maxwell to Bell, no run forward blocking up the wicket from the stumps
Maxwell to Bell, 1 run slightly straighter line and tickled wide of the 45 on the leg side
Maxwell to Ballance, 1 run width offered and slapped off the toe-end into the gap at cover
Maxwell to Bell, SIX runs tossed up outside off and Bell slog sweeps it into the stands, lovely timing
Maxwell to Bell, 1 run length ball dropped through square leg for a quick single
Maxwell to Ballance, 1 run a foot wide of off stump and guided through point
Doherty to Ballance, no run leans outside off and pushes to extra cover
Doherty to Ballance, 1 run tighter line and tickled into midwicket
Doherty to Bell, no run off stump on a length, ball back and clipped back to the bowler
Doherty to Bell, no run full length, rolled to the right of the bowler who gets down to field
Doherty to Bell, no run straighter line, pushed back to the bowler again
Doherty to Bell, no run straight line on a length and Bell just blocks
Maxwell to Ballance, no run full on the stumps, Ballance played slightly across it and got struck on the pad, cry for lbw, not out probably sliding down
Maxwell to Ballance, no run forward on off stump and blocked back to the bowler
Maxwell to Ballance, no run feels for this outside off and gets it back to the bowler
Maxwell to Ballance, 1 run back and forcing out to deep cover
Maxwell to Bell, 1 run floated up on leg stump, clipped through square leg
Maxwell to Ballance, no run forward on the stumps, blocked up on the leg side
Doherty to Bell, 1 run reverse paddled, this from a good length, finds short third man but they get a sharp single
Doherty to Ballance, 1 run Ballance this time with the reverse paddle, takes a top edge via the arms and lands well short of short third man

Doherty to Bell, OUT slog swept, missed completely and Bell is bowled. He nailed one into the stands previously but this is to a ball angled in, cramping Bell for room and it hurried onto him and his swipe across the line failed to gain any connection
Doherty to Morgan, 1 run forward just outside off and finds the gap at cover
Doherty to Ballance, no run forward to a straight line and tucking to short long leg
Doherty to Ballance, no run tucking leg side again, this time finding square leg
Maxwell to Morgan, no run forward on off stump, finds extra cover
Maxwell to Morgan, FOUR runs delicious cover drive, a whip of the hands through the line from a line two feet wide of off stump, cracks it past extra cover, glorious
Maxwell to Morgan, 1 run forward push down to long-off this time
Maxwell to Ballance, 1 run width for Ballance this time but he finds deep cover
Maxwell to Morgan, no run forward just blocking on off stump this time
Maxwell to Morgan, no run stays leg side of an off stump ball and forces it to backward point
Doherty to Ballance, no run length delivery on the stumps, whipped to midwicket
Doherty to Ballance, no run forward down the wicket, pushing to midwicket again
Doherty to Ballance, FOUR runs just a touch short outside off and Ballance cracks it through cover, well timed
Doherty to Ballance, no run floated up on off stump, clipped to straight midwicket
Doherty to Ballance, 1 run forward on the stumps, turned in front of short long leg and they get a quick single
Doherty to Morgan, 1 run sliding across the off stump, Morgan drops the hands on it and gets a single wide of short third man
Faulkner to Morgan, 1 run length on off stump, guided down to third man
Faulkner to Ballance, no run forward just outside off, tucked back to the bowler
Faulkner to Ballance, 2 runs touch wide line and driven wide of the deep cover for a couple
Faulkner to Ballance, 1 run forward with soft hands dropping this in front of cover for a sharp single
Faulkner to Morgan, no run length ball two feet wide of off stump and left alone
Faulkner to Morgan, 1 run tighter line, dropped in front of point and they get a quick single
Doherty to Morgan, 1 run full just outside off, whipped down to long-on
Doherty to Ballance, 1 run straighter line, turned to the leg side 45, just wide of him
Doherty to Morgan, no run off side 45 this time with a late cut
Doherty to Morgan, SIX runs tossed up outside off and Morgan lofts it over long-off, lovely timing following a little shimmy out his ground
Doherty to Morgan, 1 run full on the stumps, clipped through midwicket
Doherty to Ballance, no run forward and played from just outside off back to the bowler
Faulkner to Morgan, 1 wide slides just down the leg side
Faulkner to Morgan, 2 runs full just outside off, Morgan punches past extra-cover and gets a couple wide of deep cover
Faulkner to Morgan, no run good length at off stump, blocked
Faulkner to Morgan, no run slightly wider line, knocked to cover
Faulkner to Morgan, no run full length on off stump, knocked back up to the bowler
Faulkner to Morgan, no run firm punch from a fuller length to mid-off
Faulkner to Morgan, no run finds mid-off again
Watson to Ballance, 1 run tries to force from outside off into the covers, mistimes off an inside edge into the leg side and they run a sharp single
Watson to Morgan, 1 run full and wide enough to drive out to deep cover
Watson to Ballance, no run length delivery dropped down in front of point
Watson to Ballance, 2 runs touch short outside off and Ballance goes up and over backward point on the bounce to third man, they run hard for two
Watson to Ballance, no run fuller length just outside off, dropped into point
Watson to Ballance, 1 run chops a shortish ball from outside off past point
Faulkner to Ballance, no run forward just outside off and pushed in front of point, Clarke in quickly to save one
Faulkner to Ballance, 1 run manages to push this wider of point and they get an easy single this time
Faulkner to Morgan, no run fuller and pushed back to the bowler
Faulkner to Morgan, FOUR runs pulled off the front foot, it comes off a thick top edge right over Haddin, Morgan through the shot too quickly but gets away with it, hundred up
Faulkner to Morgan, no run forced from the crease to cover
Faulkner to Morgan, no run good length a good two feet outside off, Morgan goes to flick at it and misses
Watson to Ballance, 1 run full length just outside off, guided down to third man
Watson to Morgan, 2 runs some width outside off and Morgan guides it off the front foot backward of point, wide of third man
Watson to Morgan, no run full at the off stump, driven nicely but Watson saves well getting down low
Watson to Morgan, 1 run length just outside off, dabbed down on the off side and they steal a single
Watson to Ballance, 1 run forward just outside off, dropped into the covers for an easy run
Watson to Morgan, no run forward pushed firmly to mid-off
Faulkner to Ballance, 1 run wide enough line outside off to allow Ballance to guide down to third man
Faulkner to Morgan, FOUR runs step down the wicket and flicks over mid-off, nicely paid, good intent and good timing, fifty stand up
Faulkner to Morgan, 1 run forward playing off a thick inside edge wide of short long leg
Faulkner to Ballance, no run off stump line, dropped up towards point
Faulkner to Ballance, no run tight off stump line, just blocked
Faulkner to Ballance, 1 run touch wider and steered out to deep cover
Watson to Ballance, 1 run slower ball on the leg stump, it comes off the pad out on the off side and they steal an extra
Watson to Morgan, 1 run forward just outside off and pushed firmly through cover
Watson to Ballance, no run touch short and cracked to Warner at backward point
Watson to Ballance, no run firm drive from outside off but only as far extra cover
Watson to Ballance, FOUR runs full length outside off and Ballance swings it over mid-on, not nailed but clubbed well enough for a three-bounce four
Watson to Ballance, FOUR runs wide outside off and cut for another four, put away a poor ball there
McKay to Morgan, 2 runs around the wicket, short and wide and cut backward of deep cover for an easy couple
McKay to Morgan, no run fuller and a much better line, Morgan pushes to midwicket from off stump
McKay to Morgan, no run forward just outside off, dropped back up the wicket
McKay to Morgan, 2 runs length ball on the stumps, dropped into midwicket where no-one is in the ring, Bailey charges in off the rope but can't prevent the second, aggressive running
McKay to Morgan, no run good length on off stump, blocked back to the bowler
McKay to Morgan, FOUR runs wide line well outside off, Morgan chases after it and drives, getting a thick inside edge that runs fine past the stumps to the boundary
Maxwell to Ballance, 1 run floated up on off stump, guided down to long-on
Maxwell to Morgan, 1 run pushed from off stump down to long-off
Maxwell to Ballance, 1 run straighter line and tucked around the corner for an easy single
Maxwell to Morgan, 1 run swept hard from middle stump on the bounce to Finch at deep-backward square leg
Maxwell to Ballance, no run pushed from off stump into cover
Maxwell to Ballance, no run tucked off the stumps to midwicket
McKay to Morgan, 1 run driven from just outside off to long-on
McKay to Ballance, 1 run a flicked drive out to deep cover from just outside off
McKay to Morgan, no run forward just outside off and pushed to extra-cover
McKay to Morgan, FOUR runs length delivery and chipped over extra-cover, opens the face to guide it wide of long-off, well timed and four
McKay to Morgan, no run straighter line, driven, well palmed by the bowler
McKay to Morgan, 1 run tucked with the angle past the bowler's left hand for a quick single
Maxwell to Morgan, 1 run tucked off the stumps wide of short long leg and goes to fifty, it's been a really nice innings
Maxwell to Ballance, no run forward on off stump, dropped into the covers
Maxwell to Ballance, 1 run down the wicket and cracked from outside off to deep cover

Maxwell to Morgan, OUT whipped in the air from outside off and finds extra cover who takes a simple catch at head height. That's a big wicket because Morgan was playing beautifully but he's got this drive wrong and picked out the only fielder in front o
Maxwell to Bopara, 1 run tucked from the stumps through square leg and Bopara is away immediately
Maxwell to Ballance, 1 run flicked along the ground to deep cover, that's how Morgan should have done it
Watson to Ballance, 2 runs slapped from a slightly wide line backward of the cover sweeper and they come back for two
Watson to Ballance, 1 run length just outside off, tucked into midwicket
Watson to Bopara, 2 runs whipped from slightly short of a length on middle and off through square leg
Watson to Bopara, no run length on off stump, pushed from the crease back to the bowler
Watson to Bopara, 2 runs two more with another leg slide flick wide of long leg
Watson to Bopara, no run just short of a length outside off, dabbed to backward point
Maxwell to Ballance, no run slapped from off stump to extra cover
Maxwell to Ballance, no run forward push back to the bowler
Maxwell to Ballance, 2 runs back now ans clipping through midwicket, deep square leg can't save two
Maxwell to Ballance, no run full on the stumps, clipped to midwicket
Maxwell to Ballance, no run forward on off stump, pushed to cover
Maxwell to Ballance, 1 run touch wide of off stump and pushed through cover, a first England fifty for Ballance, he's done really well and looked comfortable
Doherty to Ballance, no run leg stump and whipped to square leg
Doherty to Ballance, no run back and pushing to straight midwicket
Doherty to Ballance, 1 run touch short and pulled, half-stopped at square leg, it runs away from Bailey for a single
Doherty to Bopara, no run stands in the crease and punches back to the bowler
Doherty to Bopara, no run fuller and worked to midwicket
Doherty to Bopara, 1 run fuller and flicked out to long-on
Coulter-Nile to Bopara, no run full length just outside off, pushed to backward point
Coulter-Nile to Bopara, no run full length just outside off, pushed carefully to cover
Coulter-Nile to Bopara, no run back of a length just outside off, Bopara up on his toes to push to the off side, gets a bottom edge into his pad which runs not far enough away from Haddin
Coulter-Nile to Bopara, no run same length, tried to be forced leg side but not away from midwicket
Coulter-Nile to Bopara, 1 run back of a length on a fourth-stump line, guided down to third man
Coulter-Nile to Ballance, no run leg stump line, pushed only to short long leg
Faulkner to Bopara, 2 runs back of a length and pulled through midwicket, wide of the sweeper and they get two
Faulkner to Bopara, no run length on the stumps, dead-panned but not sharp single available
Faulkner to Bopara, 1 run length just outside off, guided to short third-man and this time they do get a quick single
Faulkner to Ballance, 1 run forward to a fuller ball on off stump, gets a thick inside edge into the gap on the leg side
Faulkner to Bopara, 2 runs length on off stump, forced to cover, they steal a single and get an overthrow too as the backing-up man fails to do his job
Faulkner to Bopara, no run firm front-foot punch back to the bowler
Coulter-Nile to Ballance, 1 run opens the face and guides this off-stump delivery down to third man
Coulter-Nile to Bopara, FOUR runs Bopara does the same thing but gets it much finer off more of an edge and it beats third man's dive
Coulter-Nile to Bopara, 1 run full on off stump, dropped into the covers and they take a quick single
Coulter-Nile to Ballance, 1 run middle and leg line, tucked up back past the bowler and they get a quick single in front of mid-on
Coulter-Nile to Bopara, OUT back of a length that just bounces on Bopara looking to stay leg side and flick to leg, it angled in and takes the glove on the way through to Haddin
Coulter-Nile to Stokes, no run full and wide, left alone
Faulkner to Ballance, no run length on the stumps, tucked to straight midwicket
Faulkner to Ballance, 1 run just back in length, angled behind point for a quick single
Faulkner to Stokes, 1 run forward just outside off, pressing into the covers for an easy single
Faulkner to Ballance, no run tight off stump line, Ballance fiddles it back to the bowler
Faulkner to Ballance, 1 run firm punch to mid-off on the front foot
Faulkner to Stokes, 1 run fuller and whipped down to long-on
Coulter-Nile to Stokes, FOUR runs strong pull stroke through square leg, onto the length very quickly and nailed it
Coulter-Nile to Stokes, no run much fuller and driven to extra cover
Coulter-Nile to Stokes, no run wide full toss but slapped only on the bounce to extra cover
Coulter-Nile to Stokes, 1 run pulled once more, this time not timed and gets it well short of deep-backward square leg
Coulter-Nile to Ballance, 1 run forward just outside off playing with an outside edge to third man
Coulter-Nile to Stokes, no run good length on the stumps, Stokes tries to swing into the leg side but misses completely
McKay to Ballance, 1 run around the wicket, yorker length, gets it back past the bowler
McKay to Stokes, 1 run dabbed in front of point and they get a quick run
McKay to Ballance, 1 run length just outside off, dabbed towards point again, this is firmer but the single is still comfortable
McKay to Stokes, 1 run another single in the ring, this via an inside edge to short long leg playing in the crease
McKay to Ballance, 1 run slapped from just outside off to long-off
McKay to Stokes, 1 run forward on off stump, punching firmly to long-off
Watson to Stokes, 1 run length on leg stump, clipped through square leg and they don't manage the second that might have been available
Watson to Ballance, FOUR runs swept off the stumps and helped behind square, good stroke, nicely controlled and gets it backward of square
Watson to Ballance, 1 run outside off, tries to late cut and evade short third man but can't
Watson to Stokes, 1 run down the track and chipping into the off side, safely over cover and short of the deep fielder
Watson to Ballance, 1 run find short third man again with another late dab
Watson to Stokes, 1 run short third man again fields a back chop, they run hard for the single again
Faulkner to Buttler, 1 run full on off stump, punched just to the right of extra-cover for a quick single
Faulkner to Bresnan, 2 runs short of a length and forced through square leg with a jabbing pull
Faulkner to Bresnan, 1 run same length, this just outside off and guided down to third man
Faulkner to Buttler, 2 runs around the wicket, very full at the stumps, flicked through square leg and they run hard for two
Faulkner to Buttler, no run full toss on off stump, Buttler can only find extra-cover
Faulkner to Buttler, 1 run excellent yorker, dug out down the ground
Coulter-Nile to Buttler, 2 runs short of a length pulled into the leg side, not timed but the big ground offers them a chance to charge back for two
Coulter-Nile to Buttler, 2 runs full and Buttler scoops, gets it down to long leg with the man back, he scrambles and parries the ball back into play, good work from Doherty
Coulter-Nile to Buttler, no run very full outside off and Buttler's swipe misses
Coulter-Nile to Buttler, 1 run short of a length, Buttler aims leg side but only gets it high on the bat to midwicket
Coulter-Nile to Bresnan, FOUR runs low full toss and Bresnan swings it down the ground, well struck and it beats mid-on's dive
Coulter-Nile to Bresnan, no run yorker length just wide of off stump, I love that delivery, Bresnan swings and misses
Faulkner to Stokes, no run clears the front leg and aims a big swing to leg, misses completely and it goes well over the stumps
Faulkner to Stokes, FOUR runs shorter length and pulled backward of square, gets that pull stroke away nicely again, 200 up
Faulkner to Stokes, 2 runs slower ball, pulled again, not quite timed and Coulter-Nile comes around to field
Faulkner to Stokes, no run length ball outside off, Stokes aims a lazy slash at it and misses
Faulkner to Stokes, 2 runs back of a length on the stumps, tucked through square leg and they run hard for two with a big space available there

Faulkner to Stokes, OUT another swing to leg, misses and this time loses his middle and off bail. Two previous attempts at that leg side heave failed and it's third time unlucky as this miss costs him his wicket, Faulkner finally finding the timbers
McKay to Ballance, 1 run strong front foot drive and well-saved by short extra-cover
McKay to Buttler, 1 run guided from just outside off to third man
McKay to Ballance, 1 run back of a length outside off, guided down to third man
McKay to Buttler, no run firm punch from outside off to extra cover
McKay to Buttler, no run tries to turn this to leg but only finds midwicket
McKay to Buttler, 2 runs turned off a length backward of square and gets it wide of long leg
Faulkner to Buttler, 2 runs length ball and swung wide of long-on, Maxwell dives and saves superbly with a right hand
Faulkner to Buttler, 1 run Buttler steps to leg, Faulkner follows him, Buttler swings and gets a toe-end down to long-on
Faulkner to Bresnan, 1 run full on the stumps, Bresnan swings to leg and get a thick outside edge down to long leg
Faulkner to Buttler, 1 run yorker length on the stumps, Buttler digs it out and gets it down to long leg, 250 up
Faulkner to Bresnan, SIX runs length ball on the stumps, Bresnan clears the front leg and smashes it into the seats over midwicket, lovely strike
Faulkner to Bresnan, 1 run now swings a low full toss down the ground, this time long-on is back and it's just a single
Coulter-Nile to Bresnan, no run length outside off, swung at and gets it off a thick outside edge to extra cover
Coulter-Nile to Bresnan, 1 run leg side swing and gets it down to long-on
Coulter-Nile to Buttler, SIX runs just back in length and slapped to cow corner, it goes like a missile and lands on the rope, such power
Coulter-Nile to Buttler, 2 runs squirted out down to long leg and they sprint back for the second
Coulter-Nile to Buttler, 2 runs swung to leg, gets it high on the bat and it loops into the leg side, again they sprint for two
Coulter-Nile to Buttler, 1 run swing to leg and it comes off inside edge and pad, and runs to Haddin, they sprint through

5.40pm, tea A late surge from Buttler has given England a handy score. It was a patient beginning and early wickets saw the tourists in trouble again but first Eoin Morgan and then Gary Ballance played lively innings to give England some progress and Buttler's

Morning/afternoon, AG here. England are trying to find their way out of the seven circles and have 269 to defend - a respectable score, largely built through half-centuries from Gary Ballance and Eoin Morgan. Australia's response will give us an indicator of w
Pocket rocket David Warner and backpack bully Aaron Finch are out in the middle, Boyd Rankin has one of the new balls in hand.
Rankin to Finch, no run excellent start from Rankin, nipping back off the seam, short of a length and flicking the thigh pad on its way through, past the inside edge
Rankin to Finch, 2 runs bit of width, Finch crashes the hands through a powerful cut, wide of third man for a couple
Rankin to Finch, no run good length in the corridor outside off, studied leave this time from Finch
Rankin to Finch, no run Rankin keeps it steady on a length outside off stump, left alone once again
Rankin to Finch, 2 runs straighter line, slightly full and punches a half-volley wide of mid-on, well timed but it holds up in the outfield
Rankin to Finch, no run pitched up and Finch leathers a straight drive, Rankin reacts sharply to stop it in his follow through
Jordan to Warner, 1 wide shapes down the leg side, little bit of swing, called wide
Jordan to Warner, 1 wide again this slides down the leg side, quickish 87mph, but wide again
Jordan to Warner, 1 leg bye length ball, nibbles around leg stump, worked off the padding behind square
Jordan to Finch, no run beaten, slightly back of a length and straightening in the channel, zips through past the outside edge
Jordan to Finch, no run squares Finch up slightly, angled in and he jabs the ball in front of square, the bat turning in the hands
Jordan to Finch, no run goes a touch wider on the crease, room for Finch to swing the arms but he bullies the ball into the ground, short on the off side
Jordan to Finch, no run good line, probing just outside off, pace up around 88mph/141kph as Finch gets a stride in and leaves
Jordan to Finch, no run banged in on a length around off stump, prodded into the covers, another dot to Jordon, who came back well after starting with consecutive wides
Rankin to Warner, no run angled across, slightly back of a length, Warner swishes across the line and misses

Rankin to Warner, FOUR runs too much width from Rankin, the balls sits up to be chopped in front of point, it was in the air for a good while but between the two catchers and races away for the first boundary of the innings
Rankin to Warner, no run pushed across outside off, steered from deep in the crease to backward point
Rankin to Warner, no run length ball outside off, Warner gets across
Rankin to Warner, no run tight on the stumps, defended back down the track
Rankin to Warner, no run little bit wide, Warner stays back and cuts again, into the ground straight to backward point
Jordan to Finch, no run angling in on a length, Finch defends in front of the stumps
Jordan to Finch, FOUR runs well timed, whipped off the pads, slightly too full and swinging back subtly, Finch pings it through midwicket for his first boundary
Jordan to Finch, no run better, holding its line outside off stump, goes through to the keeper

Jordan to Finch, 2 runs uppish drive, straight to mid-off... who drops it! Shocker from Gary Ballance, straight through the hands as a toe-ended punch flew firmly but not viciously straight to him. Got to take those, Jeff
Jordan to Finch, 1 run works the ball into the leg side for one
Jordan to Warner, no run length ball, outside the line of off, tapped into the off side
Rankin to Finch, no run slightly back of a length and jarring into the splice as Finch drops back to defend on off
Rankin to Finch, no run pitched up a little further, outside off stump and left alone
Rankin to Finch, 1 wide strays down the leg side, Finch plays across the line and misses but it's a wide
Rankin to Finch, FOUR runs leg side again, short and served up on Finch's sizeable hips, he tucks into the buffet with a flick to fine leg
Rankin to Finch, FOUR runs wide of the off stump this time and clubbed through backward point, meaty connection from Finch, that'll be four more wide of third man
Rankin to Finch, no run in the channel, room for Finch to attack again, but he scuffs a length ball into the covers
Rankin to Finch, 1 run veers to leg, this time glanced to the fine-leg fielder for a single
Jordan to Finch, no run slightly short, seaming back from outside off, defended from back in the crease
Jordan to Finch, no run Jordan fires the ball in towards the top of middle and off, Finch defends to leg

Jordan to Finch, FOUR runs edged... and it flies through newly vacant second slip! Would you Adam and Eve it, Jordan bellows in frustration, he got a bit of extra bounce and clipped the shoulder of the bat, wide of the diving Cook but would have nestled

Jordan to Finch, no run pitched up and angled back in, beats the bat on the inside and thumps into pad, umpire Simon Fry squints and shakes his head but England review. May be a touch of desperation about this, having missed Finch a ball earlier, the bal
Jordan to Finch, 2 runs digs this in short, Finch takes it on and windmills a tennis smash past mid-on for a couple - odd shot but reasonably effective
Jordan to Finch, 1 wide slips down the leg side, past bat and pads - another wide
Jordan to Finch, no run keeps Finch honest, off stump on a length, gets across to defend
Rankin to Warner, no run oh hello, here's David Warner, still out there but only having faced one ball in the last three overs... gets forward to defend

Rankin to Warner, 3 runs that's a lovely stroke, just a round-arm jab through midwicket from a length ball on the stumps, manufactured the angle but won't quite get four, Bresnan dives, almost in slow motion on the boundary, to just reel it in
Rankin to Finch, 2 runs another chance but it loops wide of the catcher at square leg! Good ball, cramped him and ballooned to leg as Finch pushed at it, inches away from the diving Stokes
Rankin to Finch, 2 runs works a more orthodox scoring stroke through backward square now for a couple more
Rankin to Finch, FOUR runs goes short and at the batman, who is ready and set, hoicks a powerful pull shot over deep square leg, not far from going for six, that
Rankin to Finch, no run full and wide, just inside the tramlines, Finch lets it go and Rankin gets away with it
Jordan to Warner, 2 runs pushed across outside the line of off, leans out and spears a couple through the covers
Jordan to Warner, no run on the stumps, clips the ball to midwicket
Jordan to Warner, no run good line from Jordan, pitching on middle and leg, squares Warner up a touch as he pushes down the wicket
Jordan to Warner, no run slightly full, on the stumps, punched to leg
Jordan to Warner, no run fired through in the channel, 87mph/140kph, cut fiercely off the back foot but Morgan snags it on the bounce diving to his left

Jordan to Warner, no run Warner on the attack, slaps a length ball back down the track, on the up and Jordan sticks out his left paw... drops it! Another one goes down, just an instant reaction, three-quarters of a chance, maybe, though he saw it early a
Bresnan to Finch, no run length, tight around off stump, Finch doffs his cap and defends

Bresnan to Finch, FOUR runs right, enough with the defending, this time a straight drive whistles back past Bresnan, he tried to get his feet in the way but nearly lost a toe in the process... Finch is purring like a Bugatti out there
Bresnan to Finch, 3 runs full and wide and launched over the inner ring, the ball actually plops and stops short of the deep cover boundary but they get three
Bresnan to Warner, no run angled across on a length, Warner blocks
Bresnan to Warner, 1 run on the stumps, turned into the leg side for a single to Warner, who's having a Sunday pootle in the countryside, 10 off 18 balls while Hurricane Finch whirls at the other end
Bresnan to Finch, 2 runs too much width again, drops back and dabs wide of third man for two more
Jordan to Warner, no run length ball outside off, bit of extra bounce and play square from the crease
Jordan to Warner, no run good pace, on the stumps, pushed back on the on side, Jordan fields himself
Jordan to Warner, no run tight around off stump, driven on the up but can't time it past mid-off

Jordan to Warner, no run Warner swings hard, doesn't get hold of a chopped on-drive... but it drops a yard or two short of Ballance at mid-on! Dame Fortune is giving England a frosty shoulder at the moment, and no mistake
Jordan to Warner, no run good length on the stumps, carefully defends back down the pitch
Jordan to Warner, SIX runs slightly full, around off stump, KABOOM! Warner goes straight down the ground, grinding up five dots balls and taking six from Jordan's final delivery. Timed
Bresnan to Finch, 1 run Finch drops back and opens the face, runs the ball down to third man
Bresnan to Warner, 1 run fullish, on the stumps, clipped through square leg for one more
Bresnan to Finch, no run disciplined line from Bresnan, defended around off stump
Bresnan to Finch, 1 leg bye tailing back in on to the pads, tried to work one to midwicket but they get a leg bye anyway
Bresnan to Warner, no run length ball on middle and off, turned short on the leg side
Bresnan to Warner, 1 run on the stumps, Warner stays back and nudges one to square leg, another scampered single
Stokes to Warner, no run goes back and steers a length ball towards point
Stokes to Warner, 1 run on the charge now, opens his body up and tries to carve down the ground, gets a thickish outside edge over the off-side ring
Stokes to Finch, no run decent pace, 86mph from Stokes, tapped towards midwicket
Stokes to Finch, no run drifts down the leg side, bobbles through to Buttler via the pad
Stokes to Finch, 2 runs tailing in, fullish and pushed to mid-on, Jordan takes aim and hits... but the deflection gives Finch a second
Stokes to Finch, 1 run on the stumps and worked into a gap at midwicket this time, he's home once again as the throw comes in
Bresnan to Finch, no run Bresnan puts it on a length around the line of off, Finch defends it gently back, like a giant handing a baby a lollipop
Bresnan to Finch, 1 run full and outside off, throws the bat and gets an inside edge down to fine leg
Bresnan to Warner, 1 run slightly short, on the body, clipped through the leg side for one more
Bresnan to Finch, 1 run tip and run into the covers, a direct hit would have been interesting but there's none forthcoming
Bresnan to Warner, no run skips forward, plays the ball on the up short into the off side
Bresnan to Warner, 1 run Bresnan goes round the wicket now, full and on off stump, poked into a gap in the covers for another single
Stokes to Warner, 1 run comes forward, hacks across the line and an inside edge runs to leg

Stokes to Finch, FOUR runs shot! Finch gets a stride in and leathers the ball straight back along the ground, Stokes gets a foot in the way of it but only manages to deflect it past mid-on for a boundary that brings up Finch's half-century
Stokes to Finch, 1 leg bye pitched up on leg stump, swings across the line and misses, a leg bye rolls in front of square

Stokes to Warner, no run Warner tries to fiddle one down to third man, there's a thin nick but does it carry? Buttler holds the ball up in a sort of half-celebration, umpire Fry asks square leg if it was a fair take... There seems to be agreement and En
Stokes to Warner, no run length ball, played back to the bowler
Stokes to Warner, no run on the stumps, this jumps a little on him, jabbed defensively down the track
Bresnan to Finch, 1 run short and pulled high over midwicket, short of the man in the deep
Bresnan to Warner, 2 runs goes round the wicket, flicked through backward square into a gap and they get back for two
Bresnan to Warner, no run length, on the stumps, defended
Bresnan to Warner, no run slightly wide, Warner throws the bat hard and fails to connect
Bresnan to Warner, 1 run back of a length outside off, Warner opens the face and punches in front of point
Bresnan to Finch, 2 runs slower-ball bouncer from Bresnan, pulled gently down through square leg for another single
Stokes to Warner, 2 runs on the stumps, flicked behind square and into a gap, they run hard for two
Stokes to Warner, no run swings hard across the line, gets an inside edge down on to the pitch
Stokes to Warner, 1 run short and at the batsman, doesn't get up that much, pulled down through backward square
Stokes to Finch, 1 run bit of width, drops back and runs a single down to third man with an angled bat
Stokes to Warner, 1 run comes forward and punches to mid-off, who doesn't take it cleanly and they get one more
Stokes to Finch, no run gets across to defend a length ball around off stump
Bopara to Warner, 1 run very full on the stumps, punched down to long off
Bopara to Finch, no run very full again, dug out back to the bowler
Bopara to Finch, 1 run forward on off stump to drop into the covers and take a quick single
Bopara to Warner, 1 run just back of a length and turned out to deep midwicket
Bopara to Finch, 1 run touch wide and dabbed down to third man
Bopara to Warner, 1 run slower ball, length angled across Warner who slashes to deep point
Stokes to Warner, FOUR runs length ball turned wide of long leg and Bresnan slides and completely misses the ball and allows it to run for four
Stokes to Warner, no run bumper, hooked and missed
Stokes to Warner, no run keeps a little low as Warner tried to force off the back foot, gets beaten on the inside edge
Stokes to Warner, 2 runs this time gets the cut away and third man has to chase round to his left
Stokes to Warner, 1 run firm push to the left of mid-off and they take a quick run
Stokes to Finch, 1 run they take mid-off on again and again get home very easily
Bopara to Finch, no run forward press on off stump up to mid-off
Bopara to Finch, no run slightly wider line, angled to point
Bopara to Finch, 1 run length angled in, firm push down to mid-on
Bopara to Warner, 2 runs slapped hard square and find deep cover running to his right, they come back strongly for two, good running again
Bopara to Warner, 1 run a drive outside off, thick outside edge down to third man
Bopara to Finch, 1 run width offered outside off and easily chopped down to third man
Rankin to Finch, no run full on the stumps, calmly played up to mid-on
Rankin to Finch, no run similar area, played firmly to the same fielder
Rankin to Finch, no run shorter length and tapped into the covers this time
Rankin to Finch, no run a touch shorter still, blocked up on his toes back to the bowler
Rankin to Finch, 1 run straighter line, worked down to long leg
Rankin to Warner, FOUR runs full flourish of the bat through the line and a lovely boundary over the bowler's head
Bopara to Finch, no run full length angled in, worked with the angle to midwicket
Bopara to Finch, 2 runs wider outside off and steered wide of deep cover for a couple
Bopara to Finch, no run back on a straight line and this is blocked up the wicket
Bopara to Finch, 1 run forward and getting a thick outside edge to third man
Bopara to Warner, 2 runs played out through point, Stokes runs in to field and overruns it, conceding another run
Bopara to Warner, 1 run dropped into the covers and an easy run is available
Rankin to Warner, no run Warner plays over the top of this looking to punch of the back foot, line was a little tight for his attempted stroke
Rankin to Warner, 2 runs tucked wide of long leg and they get back for two to bring up Warner's fifty, another entertaining innings
Rankin to Warner, no run blocked in the crease around off stump
Rankin to Warner, no run back of a length, Warner waits for it and cuts hard on the bounce to point
Rankin to Warner, no run goes to pull and misses, struck on the thigh pad and the ball runs into the off side
Rankin to Warner, FOUR runs back of a length and pulled hard through midwicket, four more
Bopara to Finch, 2 runs back of a length outside off, cut over point and they get two more
Bopara to Finch, FOUR runs full outside off and Finch strokes it through the line of the ball, very nice
Bopara to Finch, no run tries to run this down fine and misses
Bopara to Finch, no run tighter line, blocked with bat and pad together
Bopara to Finch, no run forward nudge into the covers where Cook gets down to make a sabe
Bopara to Finch, 1 run touch shorter allowing Finch to find the gap at cover
Rankin to Finch, no run length ball a foot and a half wide of off stump, left alone
Rankin to Finch, 1 wide slides down the leg side
Rankin to Finch, 1 run back of a length and worked through square leg
Rankin to Warner, no run back of a length on off stump, guided through point
Rankin to Warner, 1 run same length, Warner tries to belt it down the ground but mistimes it slightly, mid-off fields well diving to his right
Rankin to Finch, no run good length on off stump, punched firmly to extra-cover
Rankin to Finch, 1 leg bye sliding into the pads, runs to the left of Buttler and they take a leg bye
Stokes to Finch, no run full sliding down the leg side, bit of pad on the way through
Stokes to Finch, 2 runs angled into the pads again, this runs to square leg
Stokes to Finch, 1 run straight line again, tucked from the crease to square leg
Stokes to Warner, no run full at the off stump, punched firmly to mid-on
Stokes to Warner, 1 run width offered and cut hard to the cover sweeper
Stokes to Finch, 1 run short and paddled carefully down to long leg
Root to Finch, no run around the wicket on the stumps, Finch pats it back to the bowler
Root to Finch, 1 run Finch back and slapping hard back to the bowler who palms it
Root to Warner, 1 run step inside the line and push to the right of extra cover
Root to Finch, no run forward on leg stump in defence
Root to Finch, 2 runs steps to leg, Root follows him and bowls leg stump and full, it's pushed into the huge gap at midwicket and Jordan sprinting in nearly ran Warner out as they sprint back for two
Root to Finch, 1 run pushed into midwicket again and this time it's just a single
Stokes to Finch, no run full on a length and defended on the front foot
Stokes to Finch, 2 runs handsomely flicked over midwicket and that brings the 150 up as the sweeper runs around
Stokes to Finch, no run forward blocking on the stumps
Stokes to Finch, 1 run forward push into the covers and they're home easily for the run despite the direct hit
Stokes to Warner, FOUR runs short and pulled hard backward of square, nice timing
Stokes to Warner, 2 runs back and pushing through square leg, again good running brings a couple
Root to Finch, no run forward and tapping back to the bowler
Root to Finch, 1 wide this is down leg side
Root to Finch, 1 run full on leg stump, flicked through square leg
Root to Warner, 1 run clears the front leg and slaps a full ball down the ground, Morgan from mid-off fields on the bounce
Root to Finch, 1 wide leg side, swept at and missed
Root to Finch, 1 run carefully turned into the leg side for an easy single
Root to Finch, 1 run worked around the corner
Jordan to Finch, no run back of a length and cracked to point
Jordan to Finch, 1 run back of a length, turned into midwicket
Jordan to Watson, no run full ball driven up to mid-on

Jordan to Watson, OUT full and it nips back past the drive and knocks out off stump. Reward for Jordan who has been impressive despite England's predicament. A beauty this is, full enough to draw Watson into the drive and a bit of in-duck off the seam t
Jordan to Clarke, no run back of a length and punched to point
Jordan to Clarke, 1 run too straight and worked down to long leg
Bresnan to Clarke, FOUR runs full length just outside off and Clarke glides his bat through the line and gets four past mid-off, super shot
Bresnan to Clarke, no run shorter length and blocked into the covers
Bresnan to Clarke, 1 run width outside off and guided down to third man
Bresnan to Finch, no run good length, shapes in a little, but well wide of of off stump, left alone
Bresnan to Finch, no run full length at the off stump, Finch plays slightly across it and gets struck on the pad, not out given to the appeal, a little high perhaps
Bresnan to Finch, no run similar delivery, knocks this down into the covers
Jordan to Clarke, no run length ball defended in the crease in front of off stump
Jordan to Clarke, no run tries to cut and mistimes it to backward point, wasn't short enough for a cut
Jordan to Clarke, 1 run back of a length, wide enough for a cross-bat shot again, this time Clarke connects and finds third man
Jordan to Finch, 2 runs full on the stumps, driven into the leg side and they run hard for two
Jordan to Finch, FOUR runs slightly overpitched outside off and Finch lays into a glorious cover drive, absolutely gorgeous stroke, perfect timing
Jordan to Finch, 2 runs tucked into square leg and again they run hard and again they come back for two
Bresnan to Clarke, FOUR runs overpitched and boofed down the ground, a hefty whack straight back where it came from for a boundary to Clarke
Bresnan to Clarke, no run length ball tailing in on off stump this time, solidly blocked down the track
Bresnan to Clarke, 1 run gets across and dabs a single down to third man
Bresnan to Finch, 2 runs on a length outside off, pushes at it and steers behind the diving man at point, third man comes up but they'll get two
Bresnan to Finch, no run good-length delivery in the channel, watchfully allows this one through to the keeper
Bresnan to Finch, no run angled in, over the top of middle and off, defended. Still the MCG waits on Finch...
Bopara to Clarke, no run full and floated up on off stump, Clarke plays over the top of it and nearly yorks himself, the ball just skidding past off stump
Bopara to Clarke, 1 run comes forward and punches a full ball down the ground to long-on

Bopara to Finch, 1 run length, on the pads, calmly tucked through midwicket for a strolled single - that's his hundred, the first by a Victorian in an ODI at the MCG, remarkably. Finch's second in one-dayers and a mature knock, albeit with a bit of luck
Bopara to Clarke, 1 run on the stumps, works another single into the leg side
Bopara to Finch, no run pitched up on off, pushed back down the track
Bopara to Finch, 1 run length ball, gets across and steers another single through backward point
Bresnan to Finch, 1 run drops short, seems to surprise Finch a touch but he adjusts to pat it down through square leg
Bresnan to Clarke, FOUR runs disdainful, dismissive stuff from Clarke, walking down the pitch and cross-batting Bresnan past mid-on, all the time in the world to play that stroke
Bresnan to Clarke, 2 runs rolls the fingers over the ball, half-tracker down the leg side, Clarke gloves it round the corner for a couple more
Bresnan to Clarke, 1 run length ball, tailing in and Clarke runs one off the face down to third man
Bresnan to Finch, 1 run on the front foot, dabbed behind point, who can't take it cleanly and they pick up one more
Bresnan to Clarke, 1 run too full, outside the line of off, driven mercilessly but towards mid-off, Cook does well to prevent it flying past him
Bopara to Clarke, no run length ball on off stump, poked defensively back to the bowler
Bopara to Clarke, no run holds its line, nips past the outside edge as Clarke pushes forward
Bopara to Clarke, no run on the front foot, tries to drive but can't beat mid-on
Bopara to Clarke, no run fullish and angled towards off stump, Clarke is busily looking for a run but digs it out towards mid-on again
Bopara to Clarke, 2 runs sliding towards middle and leg, gets outside the line and flicks behind square for a couple
Bopara to Clarke, 1 run pitched up outside off, opens the shoulders and punches one through cover point
Rankin to Clarke, FOUR runs short, wide and slapped in front of square for four, given what it deserved, another boundary for Clarke
Rankin to Clarke, 1 run better length, still width for Clarke to go at it, a thick edge skewers down to third man
Rankin to Finch, no run comes forward and taps short into the covers, quickly fielded
Rankin to Finch, FOUR runs digs the ball in short, Finch leans back and crunches the ball over midwicket, there's a man in the deep but he's not going to cut this one off
Rankin to Finch, 1 run length, outside off, stabs it square for another one
Rankin to Clarke, no run outside the line of off, drives square on the up, misfielded at point but they elect not to attempt a run
Jordan to Finch, 2 runs pitched up, touch wide and back cut behind square for a couple wide of third man
Jordan to Finch, 1 run popped back over the bowler's head, maybe stopped in the pitch slightly as Finch brought his bat down but he gets away with the miscue
Jordan to Clarke, no run Clarke drives on the up, back to the bowler, who gets a hand on it
Jordan to Clarke, no run on the stumps, plays back and defends with a straight bat
Jordan to Clarke, 1 run angled in towards middle and leg, flicked off the hips to fine leg for a single to the sweeper
Jordan to Finch, no run length ball, leg-sideish, Finch plays across the line and his hit on the knee roll
Stokes to Clarke, 3 runs pitched up on the stumps and whipped nimbly off his toes through midwicket, it's a long chase out towards the boundary but the ball slows before the rope
Stokes to Finch, FOUR runs pitched up and flumped down the ground for another four, nice high follow through and the ball sails elegantly towards long-off
Stokes to Finch, no run good line, defended in front of the stumps
Stokes to Finch, no run pitched up and played on the full towards mid-on
Stokes to Finch, no run on the stumps, punched back to mid-on
Stokes to Finch, 1 run back of a length, slightly wide of the stumps, ramped over gully down to third man for one
Jordan to Finch, 1 wide short of a length, down the leg side
Jordan to Finch, no run on off stump, Finch gets across and defends stoutly
Jordan to Finch, 1 wide zings another length delivery down the leg side - more to the extras column
Jordan to Finch, 1 run in the channel, short of a good length, waits on it and runs one to third man

Jordan to Clarke, FOUR runs ripper, extra bounce and edged between keeper and slip for four! Jordan is not so much fresh out of luck as it was never in stock today, a really good delivery had Clarke fencing outside off, it flew quickly, should have been
Jordan to Clarke, no run on the stumps, worked into the leg side
Jordan to Clarke, no run stays back to a shorter ball, steers towards point
Jordan to Clarke, no run pitched up and angled in on middle stump, clipped to midwicket where Bopara slides to his right to prevent one
Stokes to Finch, no run fullish length, outside off, pushes forward defensively
Stokes to Finch, FOUR runs drags this short and down the leg side, Finch uses the pace and rolls his wrists on a pull round the corner for four

Stokes to Finch, OUT bottom hand comes off the bat, a sliced drive soars down to third man... and, me oh my, Ballance pouches it! A wicket for Stokes, a catch for Ballance and a standing salute for Finch. If the same fielder had taken a much easier chan
Stokes to Clarke, FOUR runs edged, that'll be four more, played it reasonably well, no slip in place and he just squirted it wide of Buttler
Stokes to Clarke, no run length ball, outside the line of off but hinting back in, blocked coming forwards
Stokes to Clarke, no run good length, defended into the covers
Jordan to Bailey, no run length ball in the channel, defended from the crease
Jordan to Bailey, no run comes forward and defends into the off side, Jordan hurries to collect
Jordan to Bailey, no run bangs in a short ball, slightly leg side, Bailey jerks out of the way
Jordan to Bailey, 2 runs angled in on to the pads, tapped short through square leg, into a gap for two more
Jordan to Bailey, 2 runs Bailey goes across his stumps, glances another couple through backward square

Jordan to Bailey, no run one last appeal for Jordan, somewhat forlorn, the ball thudding into Bailey's pads but there was a woody noise as well... bowled better than 1 for 50, though that's small consolation for England
Bresnan to Clarke, no run comes forward to a length ball, below 80mph now, defends
Bresnan to Clarke, no run bouncer, not sure if it was a slower ball or just Bresnan's regular pace now, Clarke ducks it
Bresnan to Clarke, 1 run short again, pulled through midwicket with a swivel
Bresnan to Bailey, no run another half-tracker, Bailey takes his eye off the ball as he pulls down, straight to midwicket this time
Bresnan to Bailey, 1 run fuller length, tailing in and flicked behind square, kept to just a single

Bresnan to Clarke, OUT got him, another one late in the piece! Clarke went aggressively at the ball, wasn't quite there to drive and it hit high up the bat, looping to mid-off. Cook takes the catch, again thinking to himself 'What if?'
Stokes to Bailey, no run pitched up and shaping towards middle and leg, blocked from the crease
Stokes to Bailey, 1 run shorter, again at the batsman, whip-crack pull down to fine leg for one
Stokes to Maxwell, 1 leg bye short of a length, rearing at the batsman and thunking into the thigh pad as Maxwell played from the crease, they run a leg bye short towards point
Stokes to Bailey, 1 run on the stumps and tucked to leg - smattering of applause for 250
Stokes to Maxwell, 1 run goes short again, pulled confidently down through square leg to the sweeper, Maxwell off the mark
Stokes to Bailey, 1 run pitched up outside off, driven slightly aerially, past Stokes' dive, Jordan also throws himself horizontal at mid-off and makes the stop
Bresnan to Bailey, 1 run drops short, paddled through backward square from the crease
Bresnan to Maxwell, no run wide of the stumps, Maxwell has an airy yahoo and misses completely
Bresnan to Maxwell, no run digs this in over the top of the off stump, Maxwell rocks out of the way
Bresnan to Maxwell, 2 runs touch short and wide and carved over gully this time, wide of third man for a couple
Bresnan to Maxwell, 1 run angled in, worked to leg from in front of the stumps
Bresnan to Bailey, 1 run bangs the ball in short again, slightly wild hook and a bottom edge rolls short behind square
Stokes to Bailey, 1 run middle of the pitch, pulled through square leg for one more
Stokes to Maxwell, 1 wide slower ball, possibly out the back of the hand, dribbles down the leg side
Stokes to Maxwell, 1 run dug in, pulled from outside off stump through backward square for one
Stokes to Bailey, 1 run continues to pepper the middle of the pitch, flat-batted out to deep midwicket
Stokes to Maxwell, no run fullish, tailing past leg stump and Maxwell hacks and misses again

Stokes to Maxwell, 1 leg bye pitched up on leg stump, swings and misses, there's a leg bye for the taking... though Stokes makes a playful attempt to rugby tackle Bailey as he tried to field in his follow through
Stokes to Bailey, FOUR runs scooped over the ring, Bailey driving aerially towards long-off, it bounces short but that's a boundary to take Australia within one hit of victory
Bresnan to Maxwell, 1 run slower ball, nudged into the leg side for one
Bresnan to Bailey, 1 run short and outside off, rolls his wrists on a pull in front of square
Bresnan to Maxwell, no run goes full and wide as Maxwell backed away, inside the tramlines, well bowled
Bresnan to Maxwell, 2 runs back of a length, swatted in front of deep midwicket, they'll get back for two meaning Australia win by six wickets and go 1-0 up in the series

Okay, folks, that's yer lot for today. Brydon Coverdale's report should be your next stop and then Plays of the Day, why not? If you're in England, Sunday is your oyster; those in the Antipodes should slug a green grenade and then get to bed - remember you've
Australia won by 6 wickets (with 26 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Aaron Finch, AUS
